title: Sierra de Álvarez Flora and Fauna Protection Area
text: Sierra de Álvarez Flora and Fauna Protection Area is a <a href="protected%20natural%20areas%20of%20Mexico">protected natural area</a> in northeastern <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>. It is located in the <a href="Sierra%20Madre%20Oriental">Sierra Madre Oriental</a> of <a href="San%20Luis%20Potos%C3%AD">San Luis Potosí</a> state. It was established in 2000 by the government of Mexico, and protects an area of 169.0 km2.
